overview: A girl moves to the beach and spends a lazy summer exploring the ramshackle town and falling for the wrong boy. Inspired by films like "People on Sunday" rather than Frankie and Annette, BEACH TOWN is a rock and roll beach movie of the mind - an unabashedly romantic look at the lives of young people in a low-rent coastal community, where the art life is ineffably linked with their surroundings.
title: Beach Town
